TopicTitle: Dumbest Question Around (about rocks... or lack thereof)

Articles.Content:
I've seen plenty of gameplay vids with rocks on the Mun and Duna... and... how do I get those in (unless it's a mod)?

Edited July 26, 2014 by Dire_Squid

Settings > Graphics > Terrain Scatters

It also adds things to Kerbin like trees, cactuses, and bushes.

Settings > Graphics > Terrain Scatters

It also adds things to Kerbin like trees, cactuses, and bushes.

Thanks, bud.

Settings > Graphics > Terrain Scatters

It also increases lag.

Fixed that for you.
Depends on the machine. My computer can't handle SM3 terrain shaders with serious lag, but it can run 50% Terrain Scatter without any noticeable drop in framerate

Depends on the machine. My computer can't handle SM3 terrain shaders with serious lag, but it can run 50% Terrain Scatter without any noticeable drop in framerate

Another example of there's no problem money can't solve.
